articles.description: A detailed look at the figures behind the Fifa Club World Cup, and how investment from Saudi Arabia appears to be underpinning the tournament.
articles.title: Fifa Club World Cup: How Saudi Arabia is underpinning the tournament

articles.description: Sam Burns hits a sensational five-under 65 to set the clubhouse target as Scottie Scheffler battles to make the cut during the second round of the US Open.
articles.title: US Open 2025: Scottie Scheffler set to make cut as Sam Burns impresses at Oakmont

articles.description: Mercedes' George Russell heads McLaren's Lando Norris in Friday practice at the Canadian Grand Prix.
articles.title: Canadian Grand Prix: George Russell sets pace ahead of Lando Norris in Friday practice

articles.description: A victory for South Africa in the World Test Championship final would be "massive for the country" as they head into day four looking to banish their chokers tag.
articles.title: World Test Championship final: South Africa win would be 'massive for the country'

articles.description: Liverpool agree a £116m deal, which includes a guaranteed £100m, to sign Germany attacking midfielder Florian Wirtz from Bayer Leverkusen.
articles.title: Florian Wirtz: Liverpool agree £116m deal to sign midfielder from Bayer Leverkusen

articles.description: The Premiership will shorten its name to become 'the Prem' as part of a new brand for the 2025-26 season.
articles.title: Rugby's Premiership opts to become 'the Prem' for 2025-26 season

articles.description: Darts duo Luke Littler and Luke Humphries are awarded MBEs in the King's Birthday Honours, while Virginia Wade earns a CBE.
articles.title: King's Birthday Honours List 2025: Littler, Humphries, Wade & Beckham among sport names

articles.description: French World Cup winner Paul Pogba is in talks with Monaco about a return to football after serving a doping ban.
articles.title: Paul Pogba: Ex-Manchester United & Juventus midfielder in talks with Monaco after doping ban

articles.description: Tottenham are interested in signing Brentford striker Bryan Mbeumo.
articles.title: Bryan Mbeumo: Tottenham Hotspur interested in signing Brentford striker

articles.description: Former England captain Owen Farrell is close to finalising a sensational return to Saracens.
articles.title: Owen Farrell close to Saracens return from Racing 92
